name: Gargoyle Carrier
description: Umbras Carrier class ship.  It has 2 overdrives the first one release 24 missile around the ship when 3 or more target is in the firing arc. Its range can be extended by a drone. The second one is its Weapon disruption system .
obtaining: You can obtain its blueprint by attacking Umbra Blaze Cargo in Umbra sector.
tips-builds: Use Mix of Blight and explosive hammer missiles or mix it with Cyclotron.. Ablative armor, Magnetic Collar and Harmonic Thruster or Sunder.
author: Useless Sonanochi
